channel.title: Teleportation Glitch
channel.description: When you are in a close area and you teleport somewhere, other players will not see the movement, and it messes things up a lot. I saw a tutorial on how to fix this, but I can't find it... Anyone able to help?

item.title: Teleportation Glitch
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

When you are in a close area and you teleport somewhere, other players will not see the movement, and it messes things up a lot. I saw a tutorial on how to fix this, but I can’t find it… Anyone able to help?

Read full topic
